channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Hey,
Can anyone lead me to a Tutorial to show me how to make it so that while your equipping something you can't equip another certain item? Kind of like the God capes and God Staffs in Runescape. (Can't equip a God Staff while your wearing the Cape of another God) That kinda thing. The base is CloudIn 562.
Thanks Roflmfao

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-Madness Chaotic-Madness
item.description:
@Chaotic-Madness wrote:

		case (item id here):
		
		c.(skillidhere)LevelReq = (what level you will need to make it here;
		break;


                      example:
                case 13923:
		case 13926:
		case 13929:
		case 13941:
		
		c.attackLevelReq = 20;
		break;

Note: you havent told me what base you have.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

if ((itemId == ID) && (playerLevel >= LEVEL)) {
return true;
} else {
sendMessage(“You are too low of a level to wear this item”);
}
i believe this is correct.

Read full topic
